Youth Movement: Gen Z Boasts the Largest, Most Diverse

Whether you are a Cable, Mobile, or Fixed line network operator, one thing is certain. This isn't your father's network you are running. To understand what the future holds, we need to shift our focus from "Boomers" to "Millennials and Gen Z". Today, these groups make up almost 50% of the US population. Their experiences are different from Boomers, they are more diverse, and they have grown up with technology.
